    • Field Detail

      • INSERTION_LINE_TYPE

        public static final y.view.LineType INSERTION_LINE_TYPE

      • MINIMAL_DISTANCE_PAIRED_NODES

        public static final int MINIMAL_DISTANCE_PAIRED_NODES
        Minimal distance between two paired bases should be more than 4. But there are "P" nodes between "R" nodes and steps from bases to sugars should be taken into account so the distance should exceed (4R + 5P) + 2(base-R) = 11 nodes
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MINIMAL_NODES_DISTANCE

        public static final int MINIMAL_NODES_DISTANCE
        Minimal distance between two backbones to be connected with each other. Should take into account that there could be pair edges between neighbours. So minimal distance is 4R + 4P + 2(R-base) + 1()base-base) = 11 nodes
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
